name: Cute Cthulhu Slapping Simulator
description:
Please wait for the game to load :]
Do astronauts eat yogurt? 
It's an important question, because now YOU live in the fridge!
Catch the rhythm and slap them humans!
Don't let them make first contact with your kind!

Cute Cthulhu Slapping Simulator (CCSS) is a rhythm game, where you slap greedy hands that want to make the First Contact With Unknown Intelligence (YOU).

Controls: WASD/arrows

CCSS  is a submission for the GDS Game Jam 2021 by Flat Flamingo team.
Topic:  First Contact With Unknown Intelligence

Music: Komiku - Intro
